DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effectiveness of a cognitive-behavioral intervention for children aged 7 to 12 years with anxiety disorders who are referred to ordinary community clinics. The treatment will be conducted as individual therapy or group therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) for Child Anxiety Disorders in Community Clinics in Norway
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis of separation anxiety disorder, social phobia or generalized anxiety disorder based on the ADIS interview schedule, DSMIV criteria Pervasive Developmental Disorder Psychotic symptoms Intelligence score < 70 Use of medications with anxiety reducing effects during treatment Neither parent competent in Norwegian language
